name: Multiplayer Lag Protection Demo
description:
Example of lag protection in multiplayer games demo. Source code available here https://github.com/rafalfaro18/4_Krazy_Karts/releases/tag/1.1 .

Notes:

  • Replication of Actor is done each 1s to simulate lag.
  • Colliders are visible to visualize potential coliders out of sync.
  • Spin up a couple of clients to see the lag protection working.
